```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(readr)
```

```{r read-csv-data}
owid_co2_data <- read_csv("../data/owid-co2-data.csv")
```

```{r}
owid_co2_data %>% 
  filter(country == "United States") %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = year, y = co2_per_capita) +
  geom_point())
```
